meanings.definition: The quality or state of being sedulous.
meanings.sent1: Her sedulousnesses in completing her homework impressed her teacher.
meanings.sent2: His sedulousnesses in taking care of his garden showed his dedication.
meanings.sent3: The sedulousnesses of the squirrel gathering nuts was quite entertaining to watch.
meanings.sent4: The sedulousnesses of the ant colony in building their nest was like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The sedulousnesses of the student in studying for the exam paid off with a high grade.

meanings.sent1: The sedulousnesses of the detective in solving the case led to the criminal's capture.
meanings.sent2: With sedulousnesses, she practiced the piano every day to improve her skills.
meanings.sent3: The sedulousnesses of the chef in perfecting the recipe resulted in a delicious dish.
meanings.sent4: The sedulousnesses of the athlete in training were evident in their improved performance.
meanings.sent5: His sedulousnesses in organizing the event ensured it ran smoothly.
